title: Using the Verifax printer type 1
brief_description: The use and maintenance of the Manual Verifax Printer Type 1. This visual “manual” highlights the simplicity of using a machine able to make multiple copies of a designated document. The simplistic approach to this manual is both economical and approachable to printing.
